title: Taiwan Brother 7 Vegan Hut - Xu Hui - temporarily closed
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Taiwanese
description: April 2016: Reported closed for renovations, please update HappyCow of changes. The second vegan canteen under the name of Taiwan Brother 7, opened in November 2012. It's upstairs in the Taiwanese food court. Short walk from exit 4 of Xu Jia Hui Subway station, opposite a church.
streetAddress: Level 5, 339 Cao Xi Rd North, Xu Jia Hui, Xu Hui District
